original_text: And the coast of Og king of Bashan, which was of the remnant of the giants, that dwelt at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,
korean_text: 옥은 르바의 남은 족속으로서 아스다롯과 에드레이에 거주하던 바산의 왕이라

sentences.original_text: And the coast of Og king of Bashan,
which was of the remnant of the giants,
that dwelt at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,
